summary: Eva doesn't let her 3 sisters' men push them around. She's always butting in. How to pacify Eva? Find her a man. The men pay a playboy to be that man. The problem is - he falls in love with Eva.
cast: LL Cool J|Gabrielle Union|Duane Martin|Essence Atkins|Robinne Lee|Meagan Good|Mel Jackson|Dartanyan Edmonds|Kym Whitley|Royale Watkins|Matt Winston|Ruben Paul|Dorian Gregory|Kenya Moore|Yuri Brown|Jazsmin Lewis|Mane Rich Andrew|Craig Anton|Aloma Wright|Kimberly Oja|Angela Bryant|Terry Crews|Nicole Lyn|Henry Kingi Jr.|April Weeden|Steve Stapenhorst|Adam Lazarre-White|Lynn Ann Leveridge|Bobby Hall|Mark Swenson|Terry Dexter|Tony Wilkins|Tamiko Williams|Gina Taylor-Pickens|Sybil Harris|Debra Byrd|Hillary Wicht|G. keywords: latex gloves|blue jeans|hat|date|reference to william shakespeare
title: Deliver Us from Eva
